Vancouver.Merlo Field:
Harry A. Merlo Field at the Clive Charles Soccer Complex is a 4,892-capacity soccer-specific stadium in Portland, Oregon on the campus of the University of Portland where it serves as home to the school's soccer teams. Beginning March 29, 2015 the stadium will play host to the Portland Timbers' USL side Portland Timbers 2.


== History ==
The stadium was constructed in 1990.
